data.text: @JessM420 Thank you. Can you please send me a DM? *KC
@slinganswers Yeah I tried both high and medium settings. And yeah it only happens with on demand shows. And only certain ones! Lots of my other on demand shows work just fine!
@JessM420 Did you try streaming on the High and Medium settings Jessica? Is this only occurring on demand? ~ CS
@slinganswers Still doesn’t work. Constantly buffering. I noticed whenever I want to watch Harry Potter on demand on HBO it does the same thing so I dunno if maybe the episodes are janky?

@JessM420 Can you try limiting the Sling bandwidth in app while streaming the program? You can do this by going to My TV > Settings > Connection in the Sling app. Try setting the limit to High and continue streaming the program. If that does not work, please try streaming on Medium. ~ CS
@JessM420 Hello Jessica, I would like to make sure I understand the issue. The episodes you want to see are in the guide but when you try to watch them you have constant buffering, correct? *BL
